text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Whether it's the dazzling tiara, the<n>valiant chrysanthemum
that<n>represents the final crown...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
...Or the honorable autumn shield<n>we're competing for, late
autumn is a<n>lively time when Umamusume and<n>fans alike
are in heightened spirits.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The shrine is carried to the sound of<n>music, a beautiful
dance offered to the<n>Three Goddesses, and arrows<n>
released to ward off misfortune...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This all takes place at the festival for<n>Umamusume, by
Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
The Fleetfoot Festival is coming up<n>soon! This year I finally
wanna try the<n>stall that sold the first grilled carrot.<n>I'll have
to line up early to get some<n>before they sell out!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
I can't wait to see the performances<n>the different groups
are gonna put on,<n>too! I wonder which ones Tracen<n>
Academy will be in charge of this<n>year.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now then. As you are all aware, the<n>Fleetfoot Festival is fast
approaching,<n>and it is an important annual event for<n>us all
as Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I have heard word from the URA that<n>Tracen Academy will
be in charge of<n>the ceremonial dance and archery<n>shows
this year.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I will now announce the participants<n>for each event.
Participation is optional,<n>but I hope you will rise to this<n>
honorable duty.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
First, the ceremonial dance devoted to<n>the Three
Goddesses. The first of<n>three dancers is... Gold City.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The second dancer is Curren Chan.<n>Finally, the third dancer
is...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, for the Fleetfoot Festival, thinkwe can leave the academy early? Ireally, really wanna get a goodspot for the ceremonial dance!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Can you believe we'll get to see City<n>dancing?! Not to
mention Curren!<n>She's always so perfect on stage.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Waaah...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
There's the top model, City, and the<n>real pop'lar influencer
Curren...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
They're so glam'rous, I can see why<n>they were chosen to
perform an<n>import'nt dance for the Three<n>Goddesses. But
what I don't<n>understand...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yukino... Yukino? You don't look too<n>well. What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, sorry 'bout that! Lemme turn my<n>phone on silent.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Oh, uh, no worries... So um, that was<n>an Umastagram
notif'cation, right? Did<n>someone like your post?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I let everyone know I'll be<n>dancing and asked them to
come see<n>it. It looks like they're looking forward<n>to it, so
I'm happy! ♪

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
You told "everyone"? So, um... how<n>many likes has it got so
far?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: At the moment? Uh... 26,000? Oh, it<n>just turned to 27,000!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
TWENTY-SEVEN THOUSAND?! Y-you<n>only posted ten
minutes ago,<n>didn'tcha?! Eeeek!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Oh, City's manager posted too... And<n>it's already got
almost 10,000 likes?!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(So many people want t'see City and<n>Curren dance! And I
don't blame 'em!<n>That's why it's so gosh darn scary!)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah! I was thinking we could take<n>a team photo of the
three of us and<n>post it to Umastagram later. That okay<n>with
you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Let's do our best on this ceremonial<n>dance, Yukino!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: O-okey dokeyyyy!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (Ohhh, I'm in the soup!)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"I'm looking forward to seeing your<n>beautiful dance."
"She's so stunning,<n>her visuals are insane!" "Please post<n>
lots of pictures of your costume!"<n>Hm...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...I thought so. So that's why I was<n>chosen, huh...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
It is hereby... approved! Please work<n>hard on your
preparation trip for the<n>Fleetfoot Festival!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Expectations! I am eagerly awaiting<n>the Fleetfoot Festival!
Of course there<n>is the beautiful ceremonial dance to<n>look
forward to, but also...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Valiance! Symboli Rudolf and Narita<n>Brian. I will most
certainly be there to<n>watch you both show off your<n>
mastery of archery!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Director. I am grateful for<n>the honorable
appointment, and I will<n>work diligently to fulfill my role to the<n>
fullest.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to the vigorous efforts of the<n>Umamusume, there
has been<n>tremendous excitement in the racing<n>world
recently.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That's why I believe that our duty to<n>pray for their growth
and safety at the<n>Fleetfoot Festival is even more<n>pertinent
this year than ever.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
With that being said, I can say with<n>absolute certainty that
we will rise to<n>the occasion.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Please expect great things, Director. I<n>hereby pledge to
make this year's<n>Fleetfoot Festival a success like none<n>
other!
